title: Faithful Elephants: A True Story of Animals, People, and War
description: A zookeeper recounts the story of John, Tonky, and Wanly, three performing elephants at the Ueno Zoo in Tokyo, whose turn it is to die, and of their keepers, who weep and pray that World War II will end so their beloved elephants might be saved.
author: Yukio Tsuchiya
